title: Heavy Rainfall Alert – Low Lying Areas at Risk
message:
Continuous rainfall has been recorded across the city.
Low lying areas may experience water logging.

Citizens are advised to avoid unnecessary travel and follow official instructions.

title: Power Shutdown Due to Transformer Maintenance
message:
Scheduled maintenance work is being carried out on the main power transformer.
Electricity supply will be unavailable during the mentioned time period.

Emergency services are excluded from this shutdown.

title: Major Road Blockage near CBT
message: Emergency road repair in progress. Avoid CBT–Station Road stretch. Use Keshwapur diversion.

title: Water supply interruption
message: Scheduled maintenance in Vidyanagar. Expect low pressure 10AM–2PM.
